entry.title: Configure a Basic WLAN on the WLC

link.title: Configure a Basic WLAN on the WLC

entry.summary: In this lab I will learn some of the features of a wireless LAN controller. I will create a new WLAN on the controller and implement security on that LAN. Then, I will configure a wireless host to connect to the new WLAN through an AP that is under the control of the WLC. Topology Steps: 1.
